disclaimerText: This forecast is intended to provide information on expected pollution levels in areas of significant public exposure. It may not apply in very specific locations close to unusually strong or short-lived local sources of pollution.

currentForecast.forecastSummary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Sunday 30 January to end of Monday 31 January GMT
currentForecast.forecastText: After a settled start to Sunday, a breeze will develop and then strengthen throughout the day to effectively disperse local emissions.<br/><br/>Strong winds are then expected during Monday, again giving good local dispersion.<br/><br/>With relatively 'clean' air arriving from the Atlantic on Sunday and Monday, imported pollution should not be a concern.<br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>
